overview: The series is dedicated to the events of the Great Patriotic War, which forever changed the history of all mankind. With the help of documents and irrefutable facts, the authors managed to debunk the myths that falsified historical events for decades. The largest evacuation of the industry of the USSR in 1941, the legendary Soviet aviation and navy, invincible infantry, and people, each of whom is a step towards Victory.
title: Eternal Patriotic
